title: Controller Descriptor
description: A Controller Descriptor is published by a Controller with metadata about itself.

actionsURI.description: Used to retrieve Action Descriptors from controller.

adminUI.description: The Admin UI, inline or URI

bindURI.description: The location of the binding URI, used by the Realm

key.description: The controller's public key as JWK.

keyPurposes.description: An array of keypurposes, describes document types for the controller's certificate

requireSetup.description: An indication that the Controller needs configuration

addBindingEndpoint.description: Can be used to create new empty bindings on the controller.
